alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 12:13AM CDT until June 17 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville. * WHEN...From early this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Moderate out of bank flooding will occur. A few rural roads closures will be needed along the river reach. Moderate flooding will occur along the river through Greenville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 16.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
